title: al-Fatāwā al-Ṭarasūsīyah : aw-anfaʻ al-wasā'il ilá taḥrīr al-masā'il li-Najm al-Dīn Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Wāḥid ibn ʻAbd al-Munʻim ibn ʻAbd al Ṣamad al-Ṭarsūsī ; ṣaḥḥaḥahu wa-rajaʻa nuqūlahu Muṣṭafá Muḥammad Khafājī wa-Maḥmūd Ibrāhīm
author: Ṭaraṣūṣī, Ibrāhīm ibn ʻAlī, 1320-approximately 1356.
